title: LaTeX Seminar for Department Faculty Members
text:
PAS LaTeX Seminar
üìÜ May 2024, 10.00 am - 1.00 pm EAT
üè® Physical
üè° Workshop website

title: LaTeX Seminar for Department Faculty Members
text:
Summary
This seminar will provide Faculty Members at the Department of Pure and Applied Sciences with the required skills to typset documents and exams in LaTeX software.

title: LaTeX Seminar for Department Faculty Members
text:
Learning Outcomes

Understand LaTEX syntax, commands, and structure.
Learn how to format documents effectively using LaTeX including adjusting:

Margins
Fonts
Spacing
Headers
Footers
Tables

Learn how to use LaTeX to accurately render mathematical equations
Learn how to manage citations and References
Learn how to create Beamer Slides for presentations

title: LaTeX Seminar for Department Faculty Members
text:
Further Reading

The not so short introduction to LaTex
Comprehensive Tex archive Network
Tex Exchange Forum

title: LaTeX Seminar for Department Faculty Members
text:
Facilitator
 Dr.¬†Mutua Kilai is a Lecturer of Statistics at the Department of Pure and Applied Sciences at Kirinyaga University. He is passionate about Statistics and loves story telling using data.

title: Requirements for the Seminar
text:
A great part of this seminar will be conducted in Overleaf Environment. This will ensure that we are having the latest and updated packages. It is also beneficial for collaboration work.
Please create an account
The facilitator May help you with local computer problems during the seminar.
But before then kindly do the following prior to the seminar:

Download and install MikTex
Download and install TexStudio Editor







Important



Follow the steps and directions during installation. Install the basic package.
